# Investor Relations

## Corporate Profile

DIH is committed to bringing the world’s most advanced rehabilitation solutions and innovations to those that need them most, changing the lives of hundreds of millions of people in the process.

With the global population aging and increasing number of people in need of rehabilitation, robotics plays a huge role is helping physiotherapists, clinicians and doctors effectively treat the growing patient numbers – and improve their quality of life.
